Posted By: Donald Johnson
Pretty decent copy.  Slight staining in the upper right.  One horizontal crease diagonally through the collar and a slight wrinkle above the head.  Other than that, a nice clean picture and a clean back, and nice corners and edges. $80 delivered.  Paypal preferred.  Thanks for looking!
